item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

how would i make a place where when u die you dont lose items? so far ive got this and when i compile i getno errors. im using project czar and i put this under my safezones

public boolean loseNoItems() { if((absX >=3090 && absX <=3424 && absY >=3096 && absY <=3530 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
